text: @WhiteHouse A @nytimes article says @WhiteHouse #COVID19  task force is winding down. (It’s one on tv where @VP  is “in charge,” but Trump pretends it’s a rally.) Maybe now someone can get something done. Trump can stay on Twitter all day occupied with complaining about his ratings.
